1100010101011111 0101110111101001 1 -> sum: 0010001101001001, cout: 1
0011000111010000 0010101010101110 1 -> sum: 0101110001111111, cout: 0
0100001011100011 1011001011010110 1 -> sum: 1111010110111010, cout: 0

1100010100010000 0010010101001001 0 -> sum: 1110101001011001, cout: 0
1110110100111010 1111100000001100 0 -> sum: 1110010101000110, cout: 1
